## Description {#details}

A class to help implement exponential backoff.

Example usage: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#ac3a72825a12a5f0edde2b4483124b190">ExponentialBackoff</a> Backoff(10s);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (tryToDoSomething())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ItWorked;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Backoff.waitForNextAttempt());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Timeout;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

Definition at line 33 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/exponentialbackoff-h">ExponentialBackoff.h</a>.

## Public Constructors

### ExponentialBackoff() {#ac3a72825a12a5f0edde2b4483124b190}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::ExponentialBackoff::ExponentialBackoff (<a href="#a4d2c6943b41cbbf75a554c1b43a92d25">duration</a> Timeout, <a href="#a4d2c6943b41cbbf75a554c1b43a92d25">duration</a> MinWait=std::chrono::milliseconds(10), <a href="#a4d2c6943b41cbbf75a554c1b43a92d25">duration</a> MaxWait=std::chrono::milliseconds(500))</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Timeout">the maximum wall time this should run for starting when this object is constructed.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MinWait">the minimum amount of time <code>waitForNextAttempt</code> will sleep for.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MaxWait">the maximum amount of time <code>waitForNextAttempt</code> will sleep for.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/exponentialbackoff-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/exponentialbackoff-h">ExponentialBackoff.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### waitForNextAttempt() {#a2e8404047337057e4fff7e416f28ce3b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool ExponentialBackoff::waitForNextAttempt ()">
Blocks while waiting for the next attempt.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if you should try again, false if the timeout has been reached.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/exponentialbackoff-h/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/exponentialbackoff-h">ExponentialBackoff.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/exponentialbackoff-cpp/#l00014">14</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/exponentialbackoff-cpp">ExponentialBackoff.cpp</a>.
